Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
<Mel>
アルベルト
<Rondoline>
エトス
Variable
すげー、すげーよなっ！ あの時空戦士たちが、今ここに勢ぞろいってさ！
Entry.EnglishText: This is so damn awesome! I can't believe I'm fighting together with the Eternal Heroes!

Entry.JapaneseText: もう<Dio>、いい加減落ち着いてよ
Entry.EnglishText: Cool down a bit, <Dio>! You're making way too much of a fuss!

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだど、チビ助。<Mel><Mel>の言う通りだ。 テンション上げすぎだーよ
Entry.EnglishText: Just as <Mel>-<Mel> says, brat. You really are full of unresolved tension.

Entry.JapaneseText: んだよ！ どんなにすげー事か、 わかってなさすぎだぞ
Entry.EnglishText: What!? Just because I find it cool you don't need to act so sour!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ〜ん？ ミーたまと<Suzu>ちんは確かにかわいいだが、 他のはただのぼんくらだぁ
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, come on~. You sure find Miss <Mint>y and Lil <Suzu> are super cute. That other ordinary blockhead is nothing to write home about, though.

Entry.JapaneseText: 野暮天にキツネ目、酔いどれオヤジに すれっからしだど？ どこがすごいだか？
Entry.EnglishText: Then you got hunter boy, Mister Booze and shameless parade. What do you find so cool about this?

Entry.JapaneseText: う〜ん、いろんな伝記に載ってるぐらいだからねぇ。 後世に名が残るってすごいことだよ
Entry.EnglishText: Umm. Those are a lot of colorful descriptions. These surely are titles to be remembered by.

Entry.JapaneseText: ほれ、みろ！ この書き割りが！
Entry.EnglishText: Pretty biased ones if you ask me.

Entry.JapaneseText: へん！ おらだって、後世に名が残るだよ
Entry.EnglishText: Mph, whatever. That's how they should be talked about anyways.

Entry.JapaneseText: うソ！ アルベルトって、 このあと何か偉大な功績残すつもりなの？
Entry.EnglishText: That's not true! Mister Albert, you know about all of the great things they've done for this world, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろんだど。 時空戦士とおまけを従え 世界を滅亡の淵から救ったってなぁ、おい
Entry.EnglishText: Of course. The Eternal Heroes and their nameless extras saved the world from its darkest moments.

Entry.JapaneseText: 従えって……、おまえ、いつもポケットの中で、 戦ってねぇじゃんかよ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...So you think it was the extras. Speaking of which, you've been hiding in our pockets without fighting all this time. What does that make you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 自ら動かずして、世界を救った高名な策士として 後世に名を馳せる、だぁ、だぁ、だぁ、だぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Since I can't move I am nothing less than the tactician who helped to save the world. That's how I'll be remembered by. Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!

Entry.JapaneseText: コバンザメみたい、だね……
